evidence.claim: Company leverages AWS cloud services for hosting applications and data storage.
M&N Home Care Service utilizes FHIR for interoperability in health data.
The company's infrastructure supports HIPAA compliance for patient data management.
Implementation of HL7 standards for health information exchange is mentioned on their developer pages.
Use of EDI for transaction sets is described on company integration pages.

icp.icp_reason: M&N Home Care Service operates in health tech with EDI integration, fitting X12 use cases.
